step 1 description: VERY WELL, TO START, YOUR CAR NEEDS TO GO THROUGH A INITIAL SURVEY, AND IF IT IS NEAT AND 100% APPROVED HE WILL BE FIT TO BE REGISTERED.
in accordance: I am in accordance with the rules above
step 2 description:
AGORA MARAVILHA. 
 COM O LAUDO APROVADO, VOCÊ JÁ PODE PARTICIPAR DO EVENTO E VENDER SEU CARRO.
step 3 description:
CONGRATULATIONS YOU SOLD YOUR CAR. 
 NOW YOU NEED TO RECOGNIZE THE DUT IN THE BUYER'S NAME. DON'T WORRY, WE'LL HELP YOU WITH THAT TOO.
step 4 description:
THE TIME IS HERE. 
 WE'LL HELP YOU SCHEDULE THE CAR'S DELIVERY. WITH ALL SAFETY AND IN EASY TO ACCESS PLACES.
step 5 description:
FINALLY. TIME TO CASH OUT. 
 IN ABOUT TWO DAYS AFTER DELIVERYING THE CAR, THE PAYMENT WILL BE DONE DIRECTLY TO YOUR ACCOUNT.
